item.title: Hashing
item.description: Introduction In its simplest form hashing is generation of a value or values from a string of text using a mathematical function. So we also refer to it as a hash function that maps data of arbitrary size to data of fixed size. It by the definition and implementation is generally regarded as Pseudo Random Number Generators (PRNG). Properties Determinism A hash procedure must be deterministic - meaning that for a given input value it must always generate the same hash value.
